channel.title: full moon – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: Super moon tonight
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: NPR writes: Get outside if you can Saturday evening and look up. Something that only happens a couple times in most people’s lives should be putting on a pretty good show (and we can all use a break from the news of late). As NASA’s Science News explains, a “super moon” will be dominating the […]
item.content:encoded:
NPR writes:

Get outside if you can Saturday evening and look up. Something that only happens a couple times in most people’s lives should be putting on a pretty good show (and we can all use a break from the news of late).

As NASA’s Science News explains, a “super moon” will be dominating the sky.

USNO offers access to precise data.

(hat tip Nancy O.)
